data.name: Sample - Fortinet FortiAnalyzer - 3.1.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Fortinet FortiAnalyzer" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get Events For Incident
workflows.description: Retrieves all associated events for a specified incident from the Fortinet FortiAnalyzer server based on the incident ID you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Log-File Content
workflows.description: Get the content of the specified log file from Fortinet FortiAnalyzer and the log file is added to Fortisoar attachment module.

workflows.name: Get Incident for Multiple ADOMs
workflows.description: Retrieves a list and details of incidents from the Fortinet FortiAnalyzer.

workflows.name: Get Incident Attachments
workflows.description: Retrieves all attachments associated with a specified incident in Fortinet FortiAnalyzer.

workflows.name: Get Executed Report List
workflows.description: It will list all reports in pending-running or generated state.

workflows.name: Fetch Log Search Result by Task ID
workflows.description: Start a new task to search logs from Fortinet FortiAnalyzer.

arguments.title: FortiAnalyzer: Fetch Log Search Result by Task ID

steps.name: Fetch Log Search Result by Task ID

arguments.name: Fortinet FortiAnalyzer
arguments.operationTitle: Fetch Log Search Result by Task ID

routes.name: Alerts -> Fetch Log Search Result by Task ID

workflows.name: Get Device Information
workflows.description: Retrieves the device information from Fortinet FortiAnalyzer based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Incident
workflows.description: Retrieves a list and details of incidents from the Fortinet FortiAnalyzer.

workflows.name: Count Events for Multiple ADOMs
workflows.description: Fetches all events or specific event from Fortinet FortiAnalyzer.

routes.name: Alerts -> Count Events for Multiple ADOMs

workflows.name: Update Incident
workflows.description: Update incident details on the Fortinet FortiAnalyzer based on the incident ID you have specified.

workflows.name: Authorize Device
workflows.description: Authorizes the device in Fortinet FortiAnalyzer based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Add a Slave Device
workflows.description: Adds a slave device to the Fortinet FortiAnalyzer device manager database based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: FortiAnalyzer > Fetch > Create
workflows.description: Data Ingestion Playbook

resource.name: {{vars.item.subject}}
resource.description:
Event Type  {{vars.item.eventtype}}
Device Name  {{vars.item.devname}}
Device Type  {{vars.item.devtype}}
Device ID  {{vars.item.devid}}
Tag  {{vars.item.tag}}
Subject  {{vars.item.subject}}

workflows.name: Get Log Status
workflows.description: Retrieves the last log time and log rate per device[vdom] from Fortinet FortiAnalyzer based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Devices
workflows.description: Retrieves all devices from Fortinet FortiAnalyzer.

workflows.name: List Log Fields
workflows.description: Fetches all log fields from Fortinet FortiAnalyzer.

workflows.name: Get Report Schedule List
workflows.description: It will list all schedules from the Fortinet FortiAnalyzer server.

workflows.name: Get Endpoint Info
workflows.description: Retrieve a list of all endpoints from Fortinet FortiAnalzer.

workflows.name: FortiAnalyzer > Ingest
workflows.description: Fetches Incidents from FortiAnalyzer

conditions.step_name: Call Child Playbook for Less Limit

steps.name: Call Child Playbook for Less Limit

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
  {
    "title": "Pull Sample Events in Past X Minutes",
    "name": "Pull_Sample_Events_in_Past_X_Minutes",
    "type": "text",
    "tooltip": "Pull the events in the past X minutes. e.g. 10 minutes.",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": 10
  },
  {
    "title": "Search Query",
    "name": "open_query",
    "type": "text",
    "tooltip": "Query filter for fetching events from FortiAnalyzer. Supported keys are 'alertid', 'devid', 'severity', 'eventtype', 'devname' etc.",
    "placeholder": "alertid=202008311000000023 and devtype=\"FortiGate\" and severity=\"medium\"",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": "severity=medium"
  },
  {
    "title": "Maximum Records to Fetch",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "integer",
    "name": "limit",
    "value": 50,
    "tooltip": "The maximum number of records to return. Default: 50 Min: 1 Max: 2000",
    "description": "Maximum number of records that this operation should return. Values supported are: Default: 50 Min: 1 Max: 2000"
  },
  {
    "title": "Configure Multi-Tenant Mappings",
    "name": "is_mssp",
    "type": "checkbox",
    "tooltip": "Select this checkbox to map the ADOM in FortiAnalyzer with the tenant in FortiSOAR.",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": false,
    "onchange": {
      "true": [
        {
          "title": "ADOM Mapping",
          "name": "tenant_mapping",
          "required": true,
          "visible": true,
          "editable": true,
          "type": "json",
          "value": "{\"ADOM1\": \"Self\",\"fortianalyzer_customer1\": \"fortisoar_customer1\"}",
          "tooltip": "Map the ADOM in FortiAnalyzer with the tenant in FortiSOAR. This tenant mapping will ensure that the events are mapped to the right tenant in FortiSOAR during ingestion."
        }
      ]
    }
  }
]

routes.name: Check for Greater Limit -> Calculate Total Count
routes.label: Greater Limit Value

routes.name: Set Time Configuration -> Get Tenant IDs
Is data only for mapping -> Count Events for Multiple ADOMs
routes.label: No, For Ingestion

routes.name: Is data only for mapping -> Return Fetch Alerts Data
routes.label: Yes, For Mapping

routes.name: Count Events for Multiple ADOMs -> Check for Greater Limit
Check for Greater Limit -> Call Child Playbook for Less Limit
routes.label: Less Limit Value

routes.name: Return Fetch Alerts Data -> Return Data
Get Tenant IDs -> Is data only for mapping
Call Child Playbook for Less Limit -> Update Last Event Pull Time
Get Macro Value -> Set Time Configuration
Call Child Playbook -> Update Last Event Pull Time

workflows.name: Get Event Logs
workflows.description: Fetches the logs associated with the specific event from Fortinet FortiAnalyzer.

workflows.name: Log Search over Log-File
workflows.description: Run a log search task on a single log file from Fortinet FortiAnalyzer.

routes.name: Alerts -> Log Search over Log File

workflows.name: Add a New Device
workflows.description: Adds a new device to Fortinet FortiAnalyzer based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Get User Info
workflows.description: Retrieve a list of all users from Fortinet FortiAnalzer.

workflows.name: Get ADOMs
workflows.description: Retrieves all ADOMs from Fortinet FortiAnalyzer.

workflows.name: Create Incident
workflows.description: Adds a new incident record in Fortinet FortiAnalyzer based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Incident Assets
workflows.description: Fetches all assets associated with a specified incident from Fortinet FortiAnalyzer.

workflows.name: Count Incidents for Multiple ADOMs
workflows.description: Fetches all events or specific event from Fortinet FortiAnalyzer.

workflows.name: Delete a Device
workflows.description: Deletes the device from Fortinet FortiAnalyzer based on the device name parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Start Log Search Request
workflows.description: Start a new task to search logs from Fortinet FortiAnalyzer.

workflows.name: Get Event for Multiple ADOMs
workflows.description: Fetches all events or specific event from Fortinet FortiAnalyzer.

workflows.name: Get Log-File State
workflows.description: Get the state of log file from Fortinet FortiAnalyzer.

workflows.name: Get Report File
workflows.description: Retrieves  a specific report generated by Fortinet FortiAnalyzer based on the report ID you have specified and file is added to Fortisoar attachment module.

workflows.name: Get Event
workflows.description: Fetches all events or specific event from Fortinet FortiAnalyzer.

workflows.name: Run Report
workflows.description: Runs a report on the Fortinet FortiAnalyzer based on the report template name and other input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Add a Master Device
workflows.description: Adds a master device to the Fortinet FortiAnalyzer device manager database based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Update Incident Attachment
workflows.description: Updates incident attachment fields corresponding to a specific incident in Fortinet FortiAnalyzer.
